name: Kauri
description:
"The world's life force is being drained by an unknown creature. Time is limited! You need to defeat it before it's too late."

An action-platformer game made for 166th Weekly Game Jam.

Made in 10 days but still incomplete (Lacks more levels and bosses).
Music is composed by Taylor Kirkwood. Check out his works at his Youtube Channel.

If you wanna follow the game's progress, consider subscribing to my channel or follow my itch.io account.
